verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H5971>this,<s%> all you peoples. <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> all you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2465>world,<s%>
both <S%H1121>low<s%> and <S%H1121>high,<s%> <S%H6223>rich<s%> and <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> words of <S%H2454>wisdom.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1900>utter<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
I will <S%H5186>incline<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to a <S%H4912>proverb.<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H2420>riddle<s%> on the <S%H3658>harp.<s%>
Why should I <S%H3372>fear<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> when <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> at my <S%H6120>heels<s%> surrounds <S%H5437>me?<s%>
Those who <S%H982>trust<s%> in their <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> and <S%H1984>boast<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6239>riches<s%>—
none of them <S%H376>can<s%> by any <S%H6299>means<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> nor <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> a ransom for <S%H3724>him.<s%>
For the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> of their <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H3365>costly,<s%> no payment is <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H2308>enough,<s%>
That he should <S%H2421>live<s%> on <S%H5331>forever,<s%> that he should not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption.<s%>

For he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that wise <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H3162>likewise<s%> the <S%H3684>fool<s%> and the <S%H1198>senseless<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> and <S%H5800>leave<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> to <S%H312>others.<s%>

Their <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought is that their <S%H1004>houses<s%> will endure <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and their <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> places to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> They <S%H7121>name<s%> their <S%H127>lands<s%> after <S%H8034>themselves.<s%>
But <S%H120>man,<s%> despite his <S%H3366>riches,<s%> <S%H3885>doesn't<s%> endure. He is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
This is the <S%H1870>destiny<s%> of those who are <S%H3689>foolish,<s%> and of <S%H310>those<s%> who <S%H7521>approve<s%> their <S%H6310>sayings.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

They are <S%H8371>appointed<s%> as a <S%H6629>flock<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> <S%H4194>Death<s%> shall be their <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%> The <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over them in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> Their <S%H6697>beauty<s%> shall <S%H1086>decay<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> far from their <S%H2073>mansion.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> for he will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H5542>me.<s%> Selah.
<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid when a <S%H376>man<s%> is made <S%H6238>rich,<s%> when the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H7235>increased.<s%>
For when he <S%H4194>dies<s%> he shall carry nothing <S%H3947>away.<s%> His <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall not <S%H3381>descend<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>
Though while he <S%H2416>lived<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>— and men <S%H3034>praise<s%> you when you do well for <S%H3190>yourself<s%>—
he shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%> They shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light.<s%>
A <S%H120>man<s%> who has <S%H3366>riches<s%> without <S%H995>understanding,<s%> is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>animals<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
